Symbol.Script_3D:
!! Sofa Set 02.gsm
RESOL gs_resol rr=radius_i+b alpha=(ASN(a/2/rr))*2 rrr=0.04/SIN(alpha) rrrr=0.04*TAN(90-alpha) bac=b/0.9 see=gs_seat_height-0.44-leg_h zee=zzyzx-0.9-leg_h
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m=0 THEN END
IF GLOB_CONTEXT>20 and GLOB_CONTEXT<40 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m=1
IF gs_shadow=0 THEN SHADOW OFF
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_STANDARD THEN ADD a/2,b/2,0
unID=1
HOTSPOT a/2,b/2,0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT a/2,-b/2,0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2,-b/2,0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2,b/2,0: unID=unID+1
hotspot a/2, b/2, 0, unID, zzyzx, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot a/2, b/2, -1, unID, zzyzx, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot a/2, b/2, zzyzx, unID, zzyzx, 2: unID=unID+1
hotspot -a/2, b/2, 0, unID, zzyzx, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot -a/2, b/2, -1, unID, zzyzx, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot -a/2, b/2, zzyzx, unID, zzyzx, 2: unID=unID+1 del 1 ENDIF
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVA THEN HOTSPOT 0, 0,0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -radius_i,0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, b,0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT rr*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+rr*COS(alpha),0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT radius_i*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+radius_i*COS(alpha),0: unID=unID+1

HOTSPOT 0, b, 0, unID, zzyzx, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, b, -1, unID, zzyzx, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, b, zzyzx, unID, zzyzx, 2: unID=unID+1 ENDIF

! Hotspot editing ! IF gs_full_edit=1 THEN
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_STANDARD THEN ADD a/2,b/2,0
hotspot -a/2, -b/2, 0, unID, gs_seat_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot -a/2, -b/2, -1, unID, gs_seat_height, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot -a/2, -b/2, gs_seat_height, unID, gs_seat_height, 2: unID=unID+1

ENDIF

Symbol.Script_2D:
!! Sofa Set 02.gsm
! ====================================================================== ! SCALE ! ====================================================================== call "2dDetailLevel_CSo_WMCC" parameters gs_detlevel_2D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m, returned_parameters det2D
!!! ******************************** 2D
PEN gs_cont_pen
bb=b/0.844 rr=radius_i+b alpha=(ASN(a/2/rr))*2 rrr=radius_i+b+MSRear
unID=1 !!! *********************************************************** Symbol lines IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_STANDARD THEN
HOTSPOT2 0, 0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a/2, 0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a/2, b/2: unID=unID+1
CALL "Resize_A_B_ZZYZX" Parameters ALL
POLY2_ 5, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, b, 1, a, b, 1, a, 0, 1, 0, 0, -1 !!! ******************************** 1/50 IF det2D = 3 THEN LINE2 0, 0.606*bb, a, 0.606*bb endif IF det2D = 3 or det2D = 2 THEN LINE2 0, 0.486*bb, a, 0.486*bb endif ENDIF
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVA THEN ! unID = 10 drawindex 20
HOTSPOT2 0, 0: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, b: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 rr*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+rr*COS(alpha): unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 radius_i*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+radius_i*COS(alpha): unID=unID+1
POLY2_ 7, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, b, 1, 0, -radius_i, 901, rr*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+rr*COS(alpha), 3001, radius_i*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+radius_i*COS(alpha), 1, 0, -radius_i, 901, 0, 0, 3001
!!! ******************************** 1/50 IF det2D = 3 THEN POLY2_ 3, 1, 0, 0.606*bb, 1, 0, -radius_i, 901, (rr-0.606*bb)*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+(rr-0.606*bb)*COS(alpha), 3001 endif IF det2D = 3 or det2D = 2 THEN POLY2_ 3, 1, 0, 0.486*bb, 1, 0, -radius_i, 901, (rr-0.486*bb)*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+(rr-0.486*bb)*COS(alpha), 3001 endif ENDIF
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVB THEN ! unID = 20 HOTSPOT2 0, 0: unID=unID+1 ! HOTSPOT2 0, rr: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, b: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 radius_i*SIN(alpha), rr-radius_i*COS(alpha): unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 rr*SIN(alpha), rr-rr*COS(alpha): unID=unID+1
POLY2_ 7, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, b, 1, 0, rr, 901, radius_i*SIN(alpha), rr-radius_i*COS(alpha), 3001, rr*SIN(alpha), rr-rr*COS(alpha), 1, 0, rr, 901, 0, 0, 3001
!!! ******************************** 1/50 IF det2D = 3 THEN POLY2_ 3, 1, 0, 0.606*bb, 1, 0, rr, 901, (rr-0.606*bb)*SIN(alpha), rr-(rr-0.606*bb)*COS(alpha), 3001 endif
IF det2D = 3 or det2D = 2 THEN POLY2_ 3, 1, 0, 0.486*bb, 1, 0, rr, 901, (rr-0.486*bb)*SIN(alpha), rr-(rr-0.486*bb)*COS(alpha), 3001 endif ENDIF
!!! ********************************************* Background Fill FILL gs_fill_type
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_STANDARD THEN POLY2_B 5,2, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, 0, b, 0, a, b, 0, a, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1 ENDIF
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVA THEN POLY2_B 7,2, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, 0, b, 0, 0, -radius_i, 900, rr*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+rr*COS(alpha), 3000, radius_i*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+radius_i*COS(alpha), 0, 0, -radius_i, 900, 0, 0, 3000 ENDIF
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVB THEN POLY2_B 7,2, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, 0, b, 0, 0, rr, 900, radius_i*SIN(alpha), rr-radius_i*COS(alpha), 3000, rr*SIN(alpha), rr-rr*COS(alpha), 0, 0, rr, 900, 0, 0, 3000 ENDIF
!!! ************************************************* Minimal Space IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_STANDARD THEN call "fa_minimalspace_CSo_WMCC" parameters all MSType = 6, unID = 3000, MSSide = MSSide1 else drawindex 10 reqBMinSpace = 0 if MSFront > EPS or MSRear > EPS then call "fa_minimalspace_CSo_WMCC" parameters all MSType = 0, returned_parameters reqBMinSpace, MSFillType, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, MSContLineType, MSContLinePen endif
if reqBMinSpace <> 0 then FILL MSFillType PEN MSContLinePen line_type MSContLineType
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVA THEN if MSFront >= radius_i then POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, 0, -radius_i, 1, radius_i*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+radius_i*COS(alpha),0, 0, -radius_i, 900, 0, 0, 3001, 0, -radius_i, -1
HOTSPOT2 (rrr)*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+(rrr)*COS(alpha): unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -radius_i: unID=unID+1 else if MSFront > EPS then POLY2_B 8, 1+2+4, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, 0, 0, 1, 0, -MSFront, 1, 0, -radius_i, 900, (radius_i-MSFront)*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+(radius_i-MSFront)*COS(alpha), 3001, radius_i*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+radius_i*COS(alpha), 0, 0, -radius_i, 900, 0, 0, 3000, 0, 0, -1
HOTSPOT2 (radius_i-MSFront)*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+(radius_i-MSFront)*COS(alpha), unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -MSFront: unID=unID+1 endif endif
if MSRear > EPS then POLY2_B 8, 1+2+4, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, 0, b, 1, 0, b+MSRear, 1, 0, -radius_i, 900, (rrr)*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+(rrr)*COS(alpha),3001, rr*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+rr*COS(alpha),0, 0, -radius_i, 900, 0, b, 3000, 0, b, -1
HOTSPOT2 (rrr)*SIN(alpha), -radius_i+(rrr)*COS(alpha): unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, b+MSRear: unID=unID+1 endif ENDIF
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVB THEN if MSRear >= radius_i then POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, radius_i*SIN(alpha), rr-radius_i*COS(alpha),0, 0, rr, 900, 0, 0, 3001, 0, rr, 1
HOTSPOT2 0, rr: unID=unID+1 else if MSRear > EPS then POLY2_B 8, 1+2+4, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, 0, b, 1, 0, b+MSRear, 1, 0, rr, 900, (radius_i-MSRear)*SIN(alpha), rr-(radius_i-MSRear)*COS(alpha), 3001, radius_i*SIN(alpha), rr-radius_i*COS(alpha), 0, 0, rr, 900, 0, b, 3000, 0, b, -1
HOTSPOT2 0, b+MSRear: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (radius_i-MSRear)*SIN(alpha), rr-(radius_i-MSRear)*COS(alpha) : unID=unID+1 endif endif
if MSFront > EPS then POLY2_B 6, 1+2+4,MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, rr*SIN(alpha), rr-rr*COS(alpha), 0, 0, rr, 900, 0, 0, 3001, 0, -MSFront, 1, 0, rr, 900, (rr+MSFront)*SIN(alpha), rr-(rr+MSFront)*COS(alpha), 3001
HOTSPOT2 0, -MSFront: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (rr+MSFront)*SIN(alpha), rr-(rr+MSFront)*COS(alpha): unID=unID+1 endif endif endif endif
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_dialog `Sofa Settings`
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page ui_page gs_ui_current_page

CALL "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, nTabs = vardim1(tabTitles), gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page, tabTitles = tabTitles, tabIcons = tabIcons

yCurrent = 190 ! row y coordinate
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Surfaces`, x1, yCurrent, 170, 15 UI_STYLE 0,0
yCurrent = yCurrent + 25 dim stSofaPars[5] dim stSofaNames[5] UI_OUTFIELD `Sofa`, x1, yCurrent, x2-x1-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_sofa_mat", x2, yCurrent-4, 192-x2, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 25
yCurrent = 40 ! row y coordinate

yCurrent = yCurrent +25
stSofaPars[1] = "A" stSofaPars[2] = "B" stSofaPars[3] = "ZZYZX" stSofaPars[4] = "gs_seat_height" stSofaPars[5] = "radius_i"
stSofaNames[1] = `Sofa Width` stSofaNames[2] = `Sofa Depth` stSofaNames[3] = `Sofa Height` stSofaNames[4] = `Seat Height` stSofaNames[5] = `Inside Radius`
for iSofa = 1 to 5 UI_OUTFIELD stSofaNames[iSofa], x3, yCurrent, x4-x3-2, 15 UI_INFIELD stSofaPars[iSofa], x4, yCurrent-4, 430-x4, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 25 next iSofa
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 2 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! UI_PAGE 2

yCurrent = yCurrent +25

yCurrent = 190
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Surfaces`, x1, yCurrent, 170, 15 UI_STYLE 0,0
yCurrent = yCurrent + 25
UI_OUTFIELD `Leg`, x1, yCurrent, x2-x1-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_leg_mat", x2, yCurrent-4, 192-x2, 22

yCurrent = 56

Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types_CSo_WMCC" parameters all
CALL "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, nTabs = 3, gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Detailed`,`Simple`,`Off` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0 values{2} "iSofaUnitType2" SOFAUNIT_STANDARD, `Standard`, SOFAUNIT_CURVA, `Curved A`, SOFAUNIT_CURVB, `Curved B` values{2} "iLegType" LEGTYPE_1, `Type 1`, LEGTYPE_2, `Type 2`, LEGTYPE_3, `Type 3`, LEGTYPE_4, `Type 4`, LEGTYPE_5, `Type 5`, LEGTYPE_NONE, `None` VALUES "gs_resol" RANGE [3,)
call "2dDetailLevel_CSo_WMCC" parameters gs_detlevel_2D = gs_detlevel_2D, gs_detlevel_2D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m, enable2dDetLevels = 2+4+8+16
values "A" range [0.09, ) values "zzyzx" range [gs_seat_height+0.2, ) values "gs_seat_height" range [leg_h+0.2, ) values "leg_h" range [0,)
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m else gs_detlevel_3D = `Off` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` parameters gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D endif
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m=1 THEN LOCK "gs_resol" HIDEPARAMETER "gs_resol" ENDIF IF gs_detlevel_3D_m=0 THEN LOCK "gs_resol", "gs_shadow" HIDEPARAMETER "gs_resol", "gs_shadow" ENDIF
IF iLegType = LEGTYPE_NONE THEN LOCK "leg_h", "gs_leg_mat" HIDEPARAMETER "leg_h", "gs_leg_mat" leg_h=0 ENDIF
IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_STANDARD THEN LOCK "radius_i" HIDEPARAMETER "radius_i" ENDIF
IF iLegType = LEGTYPE_1 THEN leg_h=0.08 PARAMETERS leg_h=leg_h LOCK "leg_h" HIDEPARAMETER "leg_h" ENDIF
IF abs(leg_h) < EPS THEN LOCK "gs_leg_mat" HIDEPARAMETER "gs_leg_mat" ENDIF
IF gs_cont_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=4 IF gs_fill_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=19
!!! ******************************** Minimal Space
IF iSofaUnitType2 <> SOFAUNIT_STANDARD THEN HIDEPARAMETER "MSSide1","MSSide2" LOCK "MSSide1","MSSide2" ENDIF
if MSFront < 0 then MSFront = 0 parameters MSFront = MSFront endif if MSRear < 0 then MSRear = 0 parameters MSRear = MSRear endif if MSSide1 < 0 then MSSide1 = 0 parameters MSSide1 = MSSide1 endif if MSSide2 < 0 then MSSide2 = 0 parameters MSSide2 = MSSide2 endif
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iSofaUnitType2" THEN IF iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_STANDARD THEN PARAMETERS MSSide1=0, MSSide2=0 MSSide1=0 MSSide2=0 endif
endif
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iSofaUnitType2 SOFAUNIT_STANDARD = 1 SOFAUNIT_CURVA = 2 SOFAUNIT_CURVB = 3
! const values for parameter: iLegType LEGTYPE_NONE = 0 LEGTYPE_1 = 1 LEGTYPE_2 = 2 LEGTYPE_3 = 3 LEGTYPE_4 = 4 LEGTYPE_5 = 5
EPS = 0.0001
If iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_STANDARD then _legPositionType = 1 If iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVA then _legPositionType = 2 If iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVB then _legPositionType = 2
if GLOB_CONTEXT = 3 then TubeMask = 1+2 else TubeMask = 1+2+16+32 endif
Symbol.Comment: Modular curved sofa set, with unit types, leg styles, 2D symbols and minimal space.

Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
gosub "fmtypes_bwm"
gosub "gs_leg_type_bwm"
gosub "unit_type_bwm"
! ============================================================================== ! Set Migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "gs_leg_type_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "gs_leg_type", "String" gs_leg_type = `None` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_1 then gs_leg_type = `Type 1` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_2 then gs_leg_type = `Type 2` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_3 then gs_leg_type = `Type 3` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_4 then gs_leg_type = `Type 4` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_5 then gs_leg_type = `Type 5` parameters gs_leg_type = gs_leg_type
endif return
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "unit_type_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "unit_type", "String" unit_type = `Standard` if iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVA then unit_type = `Curved A` if iSofaUnitType2 = SOFAUNIT_CURVB then unit_type = `Curved B` parameters unit_type = unit_type
endif return
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "fmtypes_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then if iFMType = 1 then FM_Type = `Default Objects` if iFMType = 2 then FM_Type = `Default Lamps` if iFMType = 3 then FM_Type = `People` if iFMType = 4 then FM_Type = `Elevators` if iFMType = 5 then FM_Type = `Security and Escapes` if iFMType = 6 then FM_Type = `Stairs` if iFMType = 7 then FM_Type = `Work Spaces` if iFMType = 8 then FM_Type = `Electric Facilities` if iFMType = 9 then FM_Type = `Distribution Panels` if iFMType = 10 then FM_Type = `Measuring Places` if iFMType = 11 then FM_Type = `Lamps` if iFMType = 12 then FM_Type = `HVAC Equipment` if iFMType = 13 then FM_Type = `Sanitation` if iFMType = 14 then FM_Type = `Locks` if iFMType = 15 then FM_Type = `Built-in Wardrobes` if iFMType = 16 then FM_Type = `Furniture` if iFMType = 17 then FM_Type = `Ceilings` if iFMType = 18 then FM_Type = `Floors` if iFMType = 19 then FM_Type = `Outdoor Objects` if iFMType = 20 then FM_Type = `Computers` if iFMType = 21 then FM_Type = `Monitors` if iFMType = 22 then FM_Type = `Software` if iFMType = 23 then FM_Type = `Phones` if iFMType = 24 then FM_Type = `Containers` if iFMType = 25 then FM_Type = `Others` parameters FM_Type = FM_Type
endif return
